name: nextcellent-gallery-nextgen-legacy-fork
description: Fork of the Nextcellent Gallery wordpress plugin

scripts.copy-files: fsbin mkdir public && fsbin mkdirs public/js && fsbin mkdirs public/css && fsbin copy js public/js && fsbin copy css public/css
scripts.copy-corousel: copycopy node_modules/owl.carousel/dist/owl.carousel.min.js public/js && copycopy  node_modules/owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.min.css public/css && copycopy node_modules/owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.min.css public/css
scripts.copy-cropper: copycopy node_modules/cropper/dist/cropper.min.js public/js && copycopy node_modules/cropper/dist/cropper.min.css public/css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run copy-corousel && npm run copy-animate && npm run copy-cropper && npm run create-tmp-folder
scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs tmp/shutter-reloaded.js -c -m -o public/js/shutter-reloaded.min.js  && npm run remove-tmp-folder && fsbin remove public/js/shutter-reloaded.js

author: Fernando Zorrilla
